title: Can’t access my payslip
description: I tried logging into the HR portal to view my payslip but it says 'unauthorized access'. I could access it last month.

title: Incorrect tax details on my profile
description: I checked my employee profile and it has the wrong tax credits listed. Can someone update it for me?

title: Need to update emergency contact
description: I recently changed my emergency contact and want to update it in the system. Not sure where to do that.

title: Missing annual leave from balance
description: My annual leave balance seems off. It’s missing 3 days I booked last quarter but never took.

title: Can’t submit timesheet
description: I filled out my timesheet for this week but the submit button is greyed out. I’ve double-checked everything.

title: Benefits portal not loading
description: When I try to open the benefits portal, it just shows a white screen and won’t load anything.

title: Requesting copy of employment contract
description: I need a digital copy of my signed employment contract for my mortgage application. Can you send it?

title: Paternity leave application not saving
description: I tried submitting my paternity leave request but the form keeps resetting every time I click save.

title: Incorrect job title on my profile
description: My HR profile lists me as 'Analyst' but I was promoted to 'Senior Analyst' two months ago.

title: Login issues with the onboarding portal
description: A new hire in my team can’t access the onboarding system. It says their email isn't recognized.

title: Need confirmation of employment letter
description: I’m applying for a visa and need a letter confirming my employment and salary. Can HR provide that?

title: HR system keeps logging me out
description: The HR portal logs me out after just a couple of minutes even when I’m using it actively.

title: Health insurance details not updated
description: I changed my insurance plan during open enrollment but the HR portal still shows the old one.

title: New employee not showing in directory
description: A new hire joined last week but they’re not showing up in the internal directory yet.

title: Can’t change my bank account details
description: I’m trying to update my bank details for payroll, but the system gives an error when I save.

title: System won’t accept my leave request
description: I’m trying to book annual leave for next month but it says I’m not eligible for those dates.

title: Probation period still showing as active
description: My probation ended two months ago but the system still shows it as ongoing. Could someone check?

title: I didn’t receive my payslip email
description: Normally I get an email when my payslip is ready but I didn’t receive it this time.

title: Unable to upload profile picture
description: I tried updating my profile photo in the HR system but the upload keeps failing.

title: W-2 document won’t download
description: I’m trying to download my W-2 from the portal but it just spins and never loads.

title: HR system showing wrong manager
description: It still lists my old manager in the system even though I moved teams last month.

title: Unable to complete training module
description: The compliance training video won’t play. I’m stuck on 0% completion and can’t move on.

title: Promotion not reflected in HR records
description: I was promoted recently but the HR portal still shows my old title and pay grade.

title: Maternity leave request not visible to manager
description: I submitted my leave request but my manager says they can’t see it in their system.

title: Incorrect PTO balance after return from leave
description: After returning from medical leave, my PTO balance reset to zero. I had hours left before.

title: Duplicate profile in HR system
description: There appear to be two profiles for me in the HR system, and it’s causing confusion with reporting.

title: Can’t access year-end review form
description: I need to complete my performance review but the form just gives an 'access denied' error.

title: New benefits not showing post-promotion
description: I was told I’d have new benefits with my new role but they’re not visible in the system yet.

title: Can’t reset password for HR portal
description: I clicked 'forgot password' but the email never arrives. I’ve checked my spam folder too.

title: Need to request sabbatical leave
description: Is there a form or process to apply for sabbatical? I don’t see anything in the portal.

title: Pay discrepancy for overtime
description: My last paycheck seems to be missing some overtime hours. Can someone take a look?

title: Having trouble uploading certifications
description: I’m trying to upload my new certs for compliance tracking, but the files won’t attach.

title: Can’t nominate peer for recognition
description: I was trying to nominate a colleague for an award but the submission form won’t load.

title: Work anniversary not showing on profile
description: My work anniversary just passed but it’s not reflected anywhere in my profile or reports.

title: Onboarding checklist stuck at 80%
description: A new hire completed all their tasks but the checklist still shows as incomplete.

title: Can’t upload ID verification documents
description: The upload page keeps timing out when I try to send in my documents for employment verification.

title: Incorrect personal details in system
description: My middle name is spelled wrong and I can’t change it myself. Can HR update it?

title: Pension contribution amount looks wrong
description: My latest payslip shows a different pension contribution than usual. I didn’t request a change.

title: Unable to download payslip PDF
description: When I click to download my payslip, nothing happens. Tried two browsers.

title: Still marked as contractor
description: I’ve been a full-time employee for two months now but the system still lists me as a contractor.

title: Can’t see open roles for internal transfer
description: I heard there are internal positions open but they don’t show up in my HR portal job listings.

title: Need clarification on bonus calculation
description: My bonus amount was lower than expected. Can someone explain how it was calculated?

title: Relocation support form not submitting
description: I filled out the relocation support request but it gives an error when I try to submit.

title: Can’t access exit interview form
description: I’m leaving the company next week and the exit interview link in my email is broken.

title: Payroll details incorrect after promotion
description: I received a promotion but my pay slip doesn’t reflect the updated salary.

title: HR policy documents won’t load
description: I’m trying to read the updated remote work policy, but the document link just spins.

title: New hire hasn’t received welcome email
description: Our new team member hasn’t received their HR onboarding welcome email yet. Can you resend it?

title: Health screening registration isn’t working
description: I clicked the link to register for the health check but it takes me to a 404 page.
